meanings.definition: The act or process of dividing or partitioning into distinct parts or sections.
meanings.sent1: The segmentation of the cake into equal slices was precise.
meanings.sent2: The market segmentation helped the company target specific customers.
meanings.sent3: The segmentation of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent4: The segmentation of the population by age groups revealed interesting trends.
meanings.sent5: The segmentation of the orange peel created a beautiful pattern.

meanings.definition: A distinct part or section of something larger.
meanings.sent1: Each segmentation of the report focused on a different aspect.
meanings.sent2: The segmentation of the play into acts helped the audience follow the story.
meanings.sent3: The segmentation of the garden into flower beds added color and variety.
meanings.sent4: The segmentation of the map into regions made navigation easier.
meanings.sent5: The segmentation of the book into chapters made it easier to read in parts.
